recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Manajemen dan Administrasi Logistik, Manajemen Logistik dan Material, Manajemen Industri, Teknik Manufaktur (Sarjana)
job_description:
This position will support Quality Management System (QMS) activities within the Warehouse Department. The responsibilities include:

1. Supporting internal QMS activities in the warehouse operations.
2. Assisting in checking the completeness and validity of warehouse-related documents such as work instructions, procedures, forms, and check sheets.
3. Helping monitor daily and weekly QMS compliance in material handling, warehousing practices, FIFO and FEFO implementation, stock accuracy, labeling, and traceability.
4. Conducting simple checklist-based internal audits under supervision.
5. Assisting in tracking non-conformities and following up corrective actions within the Warehouse Department.
6. Supporting document revision, updating, and standardization related to warehouse processes.
7. Assisting in improving warehouse QMS performance through small improvement projects such as 5S, visual management, and documentation accuracy.
